images.purpose: Marketing hero for product detail and social
images.prompt: Photorealistic hero: a modern laptop on a clean desk showing a 3-5 page website homepage in a browser, soft window light, shallow depth of field, warm neutral tones, brand-accent teal #06b6d4 on key UI elements, no faces, 3:2 aspect, output JPG 2400x1600 and WebP 1200x800. Alt text: 'Launch site — quick website build.'

Clean studio thumbnail: a small browser window mockup card on a light gray background with label 'Launch Site' and price tag, crisp lighting, subtle shadow, brand accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400. Alt text: 'Launch Site — website package.'

Flat icon: monitor/browser window with a small sparkle to indicate quick launch, 24x24 grid, 2-color palette (dark slate #0f172a + teal #06b6d4), optimized SVG + PNG 128x128, provide light/dark variants and aria-label 'Launch Site'.

images.purpose: Marketing hero emphasizing scale and analytics
images.prompt: Photorealistic hero: modern meeting table with laptop showing analytics dashboard and blog, tasteful composition, cool neutrals with teal accent #06b6d4 on graphs, shallow depth of field, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800. Alt text: 'Growth Site — scalable website with blog and CMS.'
images.alt_text: Growth Site — scalable website with blog and CMS

images.prompt: Studio thumbnail: small mockup with multiple page thumbnails layered, label 'Growth Site', clean background, brand accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400. Alt text: 'Growth Site thumbnail.'
Flat icon: upward arrow combined with a browser window, 24x24 grid, dark slate + teal, SVG + PNG 128x128, include aria-label 'Growth Site'.

images.purpose: Feature hero showing a single page design
images.prompt: Photorealistic hero: close-up of a single-page mockup on a tablet with a pen beside it, soft studio lighting, neutral background, accent #06b6d4 on CTA, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2000x1333 + WebP 1000x667. Alt text: 'Extra page — additional page design.'
Minimal thumbnail: single sheet mockup with '+1' badge, clean background, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4. Alt text: 'Extra Page thumbnail.'
Flat icon: page sheet with a plus sign, geometric, 24x24 grid, dark slate + teal, SVG + PNG 128x128, aria-label 'Extra Page'.

Photorealistic hero: cozy desk with open laptop showing a blog CMS editor, a notebook, and a cup of coffee, warm tones, brand accent #06b6d4 on editor UI, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800. Alt text: 'Blog setup — MDX blog and CMS.'
images.alt_text: Blog setup — MDX blog and CMS

images.prompt: Clean thumbnail: small article card with image placeholder and title line, neutral background, accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400. Alt text: 'Blog setup thumbnail.'
Flat icon: document with pen/markdown mark, 24x24 grid, dark slate + teal, SVG + PNG 128x128, aria-label 'Blog'.

Photorealistic hero: hand interacting with a web form file upload UI on a tablet, subtle motion blur, clean UI, brand accent #06b6d4 on upload button, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2000x1333 + WebP 1000x667. Alt text: 'File uploads — enhanced contact form.'
Thumbnail: stylized file icon with small upload arrow on soft background, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, accent #06b6d4. Alt text: 'File uploads thumbnail.'
Flat icon: file with upload arrow, 24x24 grid, dark slate + teal, SVG + PNG 128x128, aria-label 'File Uploads'.

images.purpose: Hero showing booking UI and calendar
images.prompt: Photorealistic hero: close-up of hands scheduling on a calendar UI on a laptop, natural window light, calendar cells with teal accent #06b6d4, 3:2 aspect, JPG 2400x1600 + WebP 1200x800. Alt text: 'Booking integration — schedule appointments.'
Thumbnail: small calendar card with a highlighted date, soft shadow, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, brand accent #06b6d4. Alt text: 'Booking thumbnail.'
Flat icon: calendar with checkmark, 24x24 grid, dark slate + teal, SVG + PNG 128x128, aria-label 'Booking'.
